summary: The diff shows only 3 of the 6 required documentation pages were created (Static Pages, Dynamic Pages, Technology Stack). Missing are Credit System, Improvement Areas, and Best Practices documentation pages. Additionally, the required DocsIndex.tsx update and App.tsx routing configuration are not present in the diff. The backend main.mo change appears unrelated to documentation requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create comprehensive documentation page for Credit System covering complete architecture, backend data model in main.mo, migration strategy, frontend hooks (useCredits), admin interface for credit management, and usage tracking
missing_requirements.reason: No CreditSystem.tsx documentation page found in the added files. The diff only shows 3 documentation pages: DynamicPages.tsx, StaticPagesContent.tsx, and TechnologyStack.tsx

missing_requirements.requirement: Create comprehensive documentation page for Improvement Areas identifying placeholder implementations, missing features, incomplete admin pages, and enhancement opportunities
missing_requirements.reason: No ImprovementAreas.tsx documentation page found in the added files

missing_requirements.requirement: Create comprehensive documentation page for Best Practices covering guidelines for adding new tools, modifying existing code, backend constraints, frontend immutable paths, and consistency standards
missing_requirements.reason: No BestPractices.tsx documentation page found in the added files

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Documentation Index page (/documentation) to include navigation links to all 6 new documentation sections alongside the existing 11 Internet Computer development guides
missing_requirements.reason: DocsIndex.tsx not present in modified files list. No evidence of updates to the documentation index navigation

missing_requirements.requirement: Add routing configuration in App.tsx for all 6 new documentation pages using TanStack Router lazy loading pattern
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx not present in modified files list. No routing configuration added for the new documentation pages

hallucinated_features.description: Image references to generated diagrams in documentation pages (e.g., /assets/generated/component-hierarchy.dim_1000x800.png, /assets/generated/architecture-diagram.dim_1200x800.png)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specified 'Create ASCII art or Mermaid-compatible diagram syntax' for REQ-9, but the implementation uses image references instead. No image generation was requested in requirements or non-goals

BuildRequest explicitly states 'Backend remains single-actor architecture in main.mo' as a constraint. The diff shows backend/main.mo was modified, but documentation requirements are frontend-only tasks (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3 are [frontend], REQ-4, REQ-5, REQ-6 are [both] but only require documenting existing backend code, not modifying it)
